translations: n.[木] 双人横切锯；双重不利的事物；狭边粗木锯
vi.反覆弯折；利用一方打击另一方

phrs.translation: 锯齿, 狭边粗木锯, 双人横切锯
双份赌注, 这项策略称为双重损失

sentences.sentence: This divergence generates most of the whipsaw in a price chart.
sentences.translation: 这种背离在图表上通常会产生锯齿。

sentences.sentence: After one such "whipsaw," Fecteau was asked by a guard: "Are you lonely now?"
sentences.translation: 有一次在经过这样“拉锯”之后，一名看守问费克图：“你现在寂寞吗？”

sentences.sentence: Only Iceland which has suffered from a whipsaw currency has a larger deficit among developed nations.
sentences.translation: 在发达国家中，只有冰岛的赤字更大，其货币汇率起伏很大。
